heroSection.subtitle: I'm a software engineer and web developer with a passion for crafting elegant and functional digital experiences.

servicesSection.title: Web Development
servicesSection.description: Offering website design following SEO standards and optimal design principles. Aiming to attract and engage visitors while improving search engine rankings. Providing an enhanced user experience and visitor satisfaction.

servicesSection.title: Digital Business Analysis
servicesSection.description: Providing admin panel development based on business analysis. Creating custom and efficient panels to improve operations. Covering everything from data management to reporting and user control.

servicesSection.title: Cross-Platform Application
servicesSection.description: Developing cross-platform panels with responsive design standards. Designing and building panels that work seamlessly across all devices. Ensuring a consistent and smooth user experience for everyone.

experiencesSection.description: I was employed at Sarvban, a company specializing in the trade of agricultural products. There, I worked on internal web applications for the trading and support departments. I also developed the “Mazraeban” website, a platform for managing and monitoring agricultural lands (via aerial photography) for farmers. Additionally, I was involved in the development of a website related to the buying and selling of agricultural products and its associated processes.
I was working remotely with Cafe Mive, an online start-up store based in Karaj, specializing in the sale of fruits, vegetables, and generally fresh produce.

I'm employed at Wira System Pouya, a subsidiary of the Golrang Industrial Group, whose primary activity is the production and sale of retail software. My responsibilities in this company include developing web applications for the deploy and support team, developing software for restaurant kiosks, and waiter software for restaurants.

contactSection.subtitle: Interested in working together or have a question? Feel free to reach out. I'm here to help you turn your ideas into amazing digital realities. Looking forward to hearing from you soon!
